question: Show all payments.
sql: SELECT * FROM payments;

question: Show the total revenue from cancelled orders.
sql: SELECT SUM(o.quantity * p.price) AS cancelled_revenue FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.status = 'CANCELLED';

question: How many users are registered in total?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;

question: Which users are from the United States?
sql: SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE country = 'United States';

question: Show order id, user id and product id for every order.
sql: SELECT order_id, user_id, product_id FROM orders;

question: Find products whose name contains the word 'phone'.
sql: SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%phone%';

question: List all user names and emails.
sql: SELECT name, email FROM users;

question: Show products that have been ordered at least once.
sql: SELECT product_id, name FROM products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM orders);

question: Show the total quantity ordered for each product.
sql: SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY product_id;

question: Show the total revenue per country.
sql: SELECT u.country, SUM(o.quantity * p.price) AS total_revenue FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY u.country;

question: Show each user and the date of their most recent order.
sql: SELECT u.user_id, u.name, MAX(o.order_date) AS last_order_date FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id, u.name;

question: For each country, show how many users are registered.
sql: SELECT country, COUNT(*) AS num_users FROM users GROUP BY country;

question: Show the largest single payment ever made.
sql: SELECT payment_id, order_id, amount, payment_method, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 1;

question: Show completed orders only.
sql: SELECT order_id, user_id, product_id, quantity, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'COMPLETED';

question: Show users and how many different products they have ordered.
sql: SELECT u.user_id, u.name, COUNT(DISTINCT o.product_id) AS num_products FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id, u.name;

question: For each order status, show how many orders there are.
sql: SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS num_orders FROM orders GROUP BY status;

question: Show all users from India.
sql: SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE country = 'India';

question: Show each payment with the corresponding user name and product name.
sql: SELECT pay.payment_id, u.name AS user_name, p.name AS product_name, pay.amount FROM payments pay JOIN orders o ON pay.order_id = o.order_id JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.user_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;

question: Show products whose total ordered quantity is greater than 100.
sql: SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY product_id HAVING SUM(quantity) > 100;

question: For each payment method, show the total amount paid.
sql: SELECT payment_method, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments GROUP BY payment_method;

question: Show the minimum and maximum product price.
sql: SELECT MIN(price) AS min_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM products;

question: Show orders placed in the last 30 days.
sql: SELECT order_id, user_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= DATE('now', '-30 days');

question: Show products that cost more than 100.
sql: SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;

question: Show the total number of orders and total quantity per user.
sql: SELECT u.user_id, u.name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS num_orders, SUM(o.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id, u.name;

question: Show the number of completed orders per user.
sql: SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS completed_orders FROM orders WHERE status = 'COMPLETED' GROUP BY user_id;

question: Show the total amount paid per day.
sql: SELECT payment_date, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments GROUP BY payment_date;

question: Show the 10 most recently created orders.
sql: SELECT order_id, user_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10;

question: Show all completed orders with user name and payment amount.
sql: SELECT o.order_id, u.name AS user_name, pay.amount, pay.payment_date FROM orders o JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.user_id JOIN payments pay ON o.order_id = pay.order_id WHERE o.status = 'COMPLETED';

question: Show users who have made at least one payment.
sql: SELECT user_id, name FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT o.user_id FROM orders o JOIN payments pay ON o.order_id = pay.order_id);

question: Show all products.
sql: SELECT * FROM products;

question: Show the total revenue per product.
sql: SELECT p.product_id, p.name, SUM(o.quantity * p.price) AS total_revenue FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id, p.name;

question: Show all orders.
sql: SELECT * FROM orders;

question: Show the top 3 countries by number of orders.
sql: SELECT u.country, COUNT(o.order_id) AS num_orders FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.country ORDER BY num_orders DESC LIMIT 3;

question: Show the 5 most expensive products.
sql: SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;

question: Show users who have placed more than 5 orders.
sql: SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_orders FROM orders GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

question: Show the average order quantity per user.
sql: SELECT user_id, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY user_id;

question: Show the number of distinct users who placed orders in 2024.
sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS num_users FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2024-01-01' AND order_date < '2025-01-01';

question: Show products in the Electronics category.
sql: SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';

question: Show the total revenue across all completed orders.
sql: SELECT SUM(o.quantity * p.price) AS total_revenue FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.status = 'COMPLETED';

question: How many orders have been placed in total?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM orders;

question: Show all orders with their payment status, including orders that have no payment yet.
sql: SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, o.product_id, o.quantity, o.status, pay.amount, pay.payment_date FROM orders o LEFT JOIN payments pay ON o.order_id = pay.order_id;

question: Which product has the highest total quantity ordered?
sql: SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 1;

question: Show each payment id with its order id and amount.
sql: SELECT payment_id, order_id, amount FROM payments;

question: Show users who signed up in 2024.
sql: SELECT user_id, name, email, signup_date FROM users WHERE signup_date >= '2024-01-01' AND signup_date < '2025-01-01';

question: Show orders placed in 2023.
sql: SELECT order_id, user_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';

question: Show each order with the user name and product name.
sql: SELECT o.order_id, u.name AS user_name, p.name AS product_name, o.quantity, o.order_date FROM orders o JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.user_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;

question: Show each user and the date of their first order.
sql: SELECT u.user_id, u.name, MIN(o.order_date) AS first_order_date FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id, u.name;

question: Show the 5 cheapest products.
sql: SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
